Rails Credentials: The Secret Keeper

You can edit Rails credentials using:

rails credentials:edit

or

EDITOR="mate --wait" bin/rails credentials:edit

Rails might ask you to add the â€“wait option. Apparently it is important because it makes the command line process wait for the text editor to close the file, ensuring that your changes are saved correctly before the process continues
